Class FriendlyAI

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      FriendlyVI
          FriendlyAI

public class FriendlyAI
extends FriendlyVI

This actor represents a friendly turret with limited health and a faster fire rate.

Version:
2/6/2013
Author:
Martin Silberberg

Method Detail

act

public void act()
This method is called whenever the game environment acts or runs. Allows the turret to shoot and be damaged by EvilLaser actors.

Overrides:
act in class FriendlyVI

damage

public void damage()
This method recognizes damage an EvilLaser actor, deletes the EvilLaser, and deletes itself if armor == 0.
